description: Creates a SIP media application. For more information about SIP media applications, see Managing SIP media applications and rules in the Amazon Chime SDK Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: AwsRegion
parameters.description: The AWS Region assigned to the SIP media application.

parameters.name: Endpoints
parameters.description: List of endpoints (Lambda ARNs) specified for the SIP media application. (dict) --- The endpoint assigned to a SIP media application. LambdaArn (string) --- Valid Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function, version, or alias. The function must be created in the same AWS Region as the SIP media application.

nested_params.name: LambdaArn
nested_params.description: Valid Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function, version, or alias. The function must be created in the same AWS Region as the SIP media application.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the SIP media application. (dict) --- Describes a tag applied to a resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.

nested_items.name: AwsRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region in which the SIP media application is created.

nested_items.name: Endpoints
nested_items.description: List of endpoints for a SIP media application. Currently, only one endpoint per SIP media application is permitted.

nested_items.name: LambdaArn
nested_items.description: Valid Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function, version, or alias. The function must be created in the same AWS Region as the SIP media application.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The SIP media application creation timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the SIP media application was updated.

nested_items.name: SipMediaApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SIP media application.
